markdown:
<title level="1" right="Cantrip 1" pfs="Standard">
[Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=1482)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cantrip" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=22" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
<trait label="Nonlethal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=188" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 322 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Bloodlines**
[Aberrant](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=19), [Hag](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=26)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 60 feet

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Defense**
Will

**Duration** 1 round
</row>

</column>

---

You push into the target's mind and daze it with a mental jolt. The jolt deals 1d6 mental damage, with a basic Will save. If the target critically fails the save, it is also [stunned 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36).

---
**Heightened (+2)** The damage increases by 1d6.
name: Daze

</row>

---

<summary>
Cloud a creature's mind and possibly stun it.
</summary>
summary: Cloud a creature's mind and possibly stun it.
summary_markdown: Cloud a creature's mind and possibly stun it.
text: Daze Two Actions Source Player Core pg. 322 2.0 Traditions Arcane, Divine, Occult Bloodlines Aberrant, Hag Range 60 feet Target 1 creature Defense Will Duration 1 round --- You push into the target's mind and daze it with a mental jolt. The jolt deals 1d6 mental damage, with a basic Will save. If the target critically fails the save, it is also stunned 1. --- Heightened (+2) The damage increases by 1d6.
